---
id: accounts-get-accounts-account-id-overdraft-limits
title: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /accounts/{accountId}/overdraft-limits endpoint"
description: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /accounts/{accountId}/overdraft-limits)```. **FamilyType**: ```Contas``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/578584735/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Contas+-+v2.4.1), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ```DataConsentId``` and ```PactualId``` as a route or query parameter."
sidebar_label: "[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /accounts/{accountId}/overdraft-limits endpoint"

<Heading
  as={"h1"}
  className={"openapi__heading"}
  children={"[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] GET /accounts/\\{accountId\\}/overdraft-limits endpoint"}
>
</Heading>

<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/client-implementation/data/v2/accounts/{consentPactualId}/{pactualId}/{accountId}/overdraft-limits"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



[CLIENT IMPLEMENTATION] Endpoint that our client must implement to respond the Resources request ```(GET /accounts/{accountId}/overdraft-limits)```. **FamilyType**: ```Contas``` This endpoint will be used by the Receiver to get the resources offered by our customer. This endpoint must behave exactly as the specified on the  [Open Banking Brazil Oficial Documentation](https://openfinancebrasil.atlassian.net/wiki/spaces/OF/pages/578584735/Informa+es+T+cnicas+-+DC+Contas+-+v2.4.1), except by the Authentication type, it must implement a mTLS The path can be parametrized by the client, it is just a suggestion, except by the fact that it must receive the ```DataConsentId``` and ```PactualId``` as a route or query parameter.

<Heading
  id={"request"}
  as={"h2"}
  className={"openapi-tabs__heading"}
  children={"Request"}
>
</Heading>

<ParamsDetails
  parameters={[{"name":"accountId","description":"Identificador da conta de depósito à vista, de poupança ou de pagamento pré-paga.","schema":{"maxLength":100,"pattern":"^[a-zA-Z0-9][a-zA-Z0-9\\-]{0,99}$","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"pactualId","description":"The Data operation PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true},{"name":"consentPactualId","description":"The Consent PactualId","schema":{"format":"uuid","type":"string"},"in":"path","required":true}]}
>
  
</ParamsDetails>

<RequestSchema
  title={"Body"}
  body={undefined}
>
  
</RequestSchema>
